title: Freshly graded PSA 2-3 commons with nicer eye appeal
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Freshly graded PSA 2-3 commons with nicer eye appeal
posts.post_content:
Just got these back from PSA.  Brand new cases, no scratches.  I sent them in expecting 3s and up, and in most cases 3.5s and up.  These are the ones that graded lower, but still have the eye appeal of a higher graded card.

These scans came out smaller than I had intended.  Please let me know if you'd like a larger scan of any of the cards.  I can add it to the thread or send it to you via email.

Shipping for 1 or 2 cards is $3.00
Please add $1 for each additional card after the first two.

Paypal goods only please

CF=Crease-free

PSA 2:
Bransfield $35 sold (has some really faint blue markings on back which I didn't notice until now)
McLean $34 sold
O'Hara CF $34 sold
Perring $32

PSA 2.5:
Grimshaw CF $38
Sheckard CF $38  sold

PSA 3:
Abbaticchio $42

Very nice cards.  Shocked that many of them are under graded!
